speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing alright, thanks. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling about your outstanding balance with Universal Credit. Can I have your account number to pull up your information?

speaker: Customer
text: I don’t have that right now. Can you tell me what balance you're referring to?

speaker: Agent
text: Your current balance is three hundred fifty dollars. How would you like to proceed with this payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can’t pay that today. Can we set up a payment plan?

speaker: Agent
text: Sure! We can set up a payment plan. How much can you pay today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can manage fifty dollars today.

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! I’ll apply that towards your balance. Can I verify your last four digits of your Social Security number?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you! We’ve noted your payment. You will still have a remaining balance of three hundred dollars.

speaker: Customer
text: Okay, but how do I keep track of my payment plan?

speaker: Agent
text: We will send you a confirmation email with all the details and a link to check your account status online.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Thank you for your cooperation. Have a nice day!
